Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Jun 2019As the saying goes, time in the market is better than timing the market. Thus, adopt a long term mindset and ensure that the risk level that you've chosen is the right one where you are able to sleep in peace at night. Keep doing what you do, i.e. dollar cost average every month where you'll purchase more units when the price drops! Generally and eventually, the market would rise in the long run.0 comments1
